Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: Here you are, dear. You're on time as I expected.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Was it any inconvenience to get everything I requested?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: But I hope what I've prepared will be to your liking.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line2: I'm sure the meal will be wonderful.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: Thank you for your service, dear.
Speaker.line2: I'm sure the meal will be wonderful.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: [You serve the meal to Ms. Martha and start brewing the tea.]
